title: BugSplat Errors for Anyone Else?
body: Hi, I've been having this ongoing problem. Every time I open the game, I get a bugsplat error. The thing is, nothing is wrong as far as I can tell and the game continues to run smoothly. I was wondering if anyone else was having this problem and perhaps if it's on my end or something with the client itself.

replies.body: Similar issue here -- would be good to know from Riot what is going on here, esp if it is a virus.

i have had the same issue and have been shutting down my comp instead of clicking on the bugsplat message. Long ago my computer got infected by Bugsplat which is a trojan virus if I remember right. The first time I saw it when trying to launch, I just turned off my comp and turned it back on and it was gone, but the last couple times I tried to log on it popped back up and turning my laptop off didn't work. Hope someone has an answer for this because thats a nasty virus.
